*Bubbles flowed up from underwater vents, the volcanic spouts sending off 
deadly waves of heat which killed all within the bounties of their domain. 
Their heat source being that of earth�s volcanic core, deep within the 
center of the plant�where a conversation was going on.*

� There are beings of metal above, � a bubbly voice echoed through the walls 
of a molten cavern within the very heart of the core.
� Yes, many. Which can develop into problems,� a deeper voice answered.  � 
They have destroyed much of us, exposing our flesh and creating pain.� The 
bubbly tone responded � They must be terminated.�
The greater of the minds thought. � But to waste so needlessly, it�s not our 
way,� the deeper voice decided. It was the lesser minds turn to think now. � 
Their bodies as well�could not decompose and feed us as the others do.� It 
spoke.  The greater mind agreed.
6The voice bubbled along with the lava, leaving the greater mind to think of 
what it said, � So if we do not destroy them, what can we do? They cause 
damage and inflict pain to us, such creatures much be more hostile the 
peaceful, surely.�
The deeper gurgled. � Yes, but they cannot decompose then they must be 
examined more closely, so we may determine a way to either destroy them of 
defeat them.� Bubbling in satisfaction, the lesser voice agreed, � We must 
understand before we can destroy�� it paused,��but how?�
The deeper voice laughed, � The only way we can.�
The magma in the cavern began to bubble and hiss as 6 spikes of lava shot up 
from the moving stream of molten rock, cooling very quickly and becoming 
brown/black rock.  Suddenly layers of rock burst, leaving behind statues of 
very similar beings as those they knew of above.
� Once to the second realm we will give them life, sending them into the 
open limbs of those�things,? The deeper of the two explained.
� Creating beings to penetrate into society of infesting Metals, or spies 
within them. Perfect!,� the other bubbled/laughed. � With such limited 
thinking they will never know.� � Of course not.�
The statues melted back into the molten rock, while 20 clicks from the 
nearest Alliance position (island) the ocean began to boil. All sea life 
seemed untouched from the wave of heat then spilled out from the open hold 
that just formed in the sea floor, lava flowing from it and into a wide 
circle until, hours later, a round mountain formed, the outer layer cooling 
as the flow stopped and the water temperature returned to normal. In 
seconds, though, the crust of the mountain fell away to leave behind a 
smaller one that was more egg shaped. In the second second chemicals began 
to meld in the rock, creating a smooth silver coating that covered the 
entire mountain, reflecting the light that spilled down from the surface.
Holes appeared in the silver rock while rock melted over them until it 
became clear and formed glass. A larger hole appeared on the top of the 
armor coated hill rock from inside expelling out of it and into the ocean to 
be caught and drift away in the tides as dust. The hole disappeared then.
So now, where a blank sand field had been before, a ship lay. Quickly being 
coated with coral, quickly coating it to make it look like it�d been there 
forever.
But inside the ship, in a room freshly formed, lay the 6 statues. Each a 
different size and each melding to form it�s own coating while the inner 
rock formed their workings. Soon, instead of rock, 6 transformers lay 
instead.
Even with the detail of each individual spark, each signature, and all 
formed from the elements. Earth�s new creations, given the power of life.*
